definitions.title: vb. Hiph
definitions.body: mock, deceive, trifle with (perhaps akin to Ar. dal=a act coquettishly; cf. secondary √ [[[הָתַל]]] p. 251);—mock trifle with, c. [[ב]] pers.: Pf. 3 ms. ([[בִּי]])[[הֵ֫תֶל ]] Ge 31:7 (E), 2 ms [[הֵתַ֫לְתָּ]] Ju Jdg 16:10, Jdg 16:13, Jdg 16:15; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְהָתֵ֫לּוּ]] Je 9:4, 2 mpl. [[תְּהָתֵ֫לּוּ]] Job 13:9 (on both v. Ges:§ 53 q Baer:ad loc.); Inf. cstr. Job 13:19 and (abs.) Ex 8:25 (J).

definitions.title: Hoph
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הוּתַל]] Is 44:20 a heart (which) is deceived.—Vid. [[[הָתַל]]], [[הֲתֻלִים]] p. 251.
